name: Subsideria
description: Subsideria is a modernised reincarnation of the classic arcade space shooters, re-imagined with boss fights, multiple game modes and more; how long can you survive the oncoming asteroid barrage?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista 32-bit Processor: Intel i3 Dual Core 2GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4600 / GeForce 710m / Radeon HD 5550 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel i5 Quad Core 3Ghz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: Intel Iris 580 / GeForce GTX 950m / Radeon R7 370 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
